- It seems as though the torrents aren't being very well seeded and due to the fact I've found where Gamestar is posting direct DL links to the same files I'm re-downloading the torrent to get all the files in the same place, hence to give a boost to seeding.

- Don't forget to thank Gamestar, especially as he may read this post at some point. As he suggests and I quote;

"It Takes 3 Hours To Encode and Upload A Single Episode. It Only Takes A few Seconds to Say THANK YOU.
